thread.title: Eddie Howe confirms Bournemouth failed in late bid to re-sign Chelsea's Nathan Ake
thread.title_full: Eddie Howe confirms Bournemouth failed in late bid to re-sign Chelsea's Nathan Ake

author: Adrian Kajumba
title: Eddie Howe confirms Bournemouth failed in late bid to re-sign Chelsea's Nathan Ake
text:
Bournemouth failed in their bid to re-sign Nathan Ake (Photo: Michael Steele) Share Get Chelsea FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Eddie Howe confirmed Bournemouth failed in their attempts to re-sign Nathan Ake from Chelsea. 
As revealed by Mirror Sport , the Cherries were keen to bring Dutch defender Ake back to the Vitality Stadium after a successful loan spell in the first half of the season. 
But their approach was rebuffed by Chelsea who rate Ake, 21, as one of their best young prospects. 
Bournemouth boss Howe said: “We had discussions with Chelsea. We made an enquiry about bringing him back on loan or permanently, but that was denied.” 
Bournemouth did loan out striker Lewis Grabban to Reading and agreed a loan deal with West Brom for defender Marc Wilson. Like us on Facebook
